content: Piyush P Kurur|Home Piyush P Kurur About me I work at the department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Palakkad. I try to make sense of the complex world around us through the tools of computer science: algorithms, complexity and logic. Research and publications page. Teaching Software. Teaching this semester This semester I am teaching Compilers.
